ectotherm: This creature does not regulate it's own temperature. They slow down in very hot and very cold temperatures. In addition, they may relax and experience a lapse in judgement if exposed to a comforatble warm temperature.
endotherm: This creature regulates it's own body temperature, and function at roughly the same level regardless of the outside temperature.
male: This creature is of the male sex.
female: This creature is of the female sex.
natal: This creature is in the youngest stage of development, whether it is an egg or a baby.
juvenile: This creature is in the second stage of development, and will sometimes say the darndest things.
adolescent: This creature is in the third stage of development, and will sometimes be a little snarky.
young adult: This creature is in the final stage of development, though it still might be quite naive.
adult: This creature is in the final stage of development, and can confidently make decisions for themselves.
elderly: This creature is past it's prime, but still may have some wisdom to give. Or crankiness. It's really a 50/50 chance.
